root.title: Basic page
root.main:
This is a basic page. However, it is a lot more complex than the name suggests. There are many variations on this page type, for example:

  • The text can be displayed in columns
  • Images can be fixed or fluid
  • Video and audio can be displayed along side text content from sources like youtube and vimeo
This is an example of a basic page with a portrait image fixed to the right.
